name: Acolyte of Pain
description:
Entered via: Pain rift #20211028
Power level: Creeper
Size: 5.5 feet/ 1.68 meters tall
Aspect: Pain
Secondary Aspects: None

Mutilated and scarred, Acolytes of Pain are demonic humanoids transformed by surgical experimentation. Turning the stump of an arm into a morning glory by embedding nails, removing their own eyes - nothing short of death is out of the picture for these masochists who worship pain in all of its forms, and seek to share their “blessing” of pain with all they encounter.

Acolytes of Pain often use tools to torture and mutilate their victims, and it’s often better to die a fast death than let one catch you. They possess average human-level strength and durability, and so while extremely dangerous due to them seeking pain rather than recoiling from it, are merely Creeper level.
